import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Row,Container,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import data from '../../data/Trip.json' import NavbarComp from '../../components/navbar/NavbarComp' import './styledet.css' import res from '../../assets/icons/resort.png' function DetailPage({match}) { const [detail,setDetail] = useState({}) const {id} = match.params useEffect( () => { let idd = id - 1 setDetail(data[idd]) },[] ) return ( <>

{detail.day}D/{detail.night}N {detail.title}

{detail?.country}

{detail?.img?.map( (items,idx) => )}

Information Trip
Acomodation

Hotel {detail.night}

Transpotasion

Eat

Duration

Date Trip
) } export default DetailPage
